name: The Chronicles of Kay (DEMO) Updated 0.3.1! (Boss Test, please feedback <3)
name_original: The Chronicles of Kay (DEMO) Updated 0.3.1! (Boss Test, please feedback <3)
description:
Welcome to the Demo of The Chronicles of Kay! I hope you like it and please give me some feedback and comments to keep going, thanks for play!

Recommend to download the game, it has some lag issues in the browser.

You can play with a ps4 controller!!

Fix and Updates:  

- Added Menu and level select (with sound)

- Added Block System (not finish, let me know bugs please ^^)

- Added Potions (darksouls like)

- Camera can look down now, with the down arrow.

- Put 0,5 of invulnerability.

- Fixed the Paralax.

- Add level 2 (testing)

- Now you can kill bats

- Add skeleton (fireballs caster)

Controller: 

- X : Jump 

- Square: Attack

- Right analog: Look down

(Press options to start)

PC: 

- Space : Jump

 - X : Attack 

- Down Arrow : Look down 

(Press enter to start)

Bugs: Sometimes the character goes invulnerable for ever. (Dont know why...)
